channel.title: Quest compiler
channel.description:
Hey was just wondering how to construct the compiler that is located in....
RSCD_v25/Quests/(Compile_scripts.bat)
Not sure what this compiles into, Dont have a clue because the batch file had nothing in it.

item.title: Quest compiler
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

so basically… um…

@echo off
javac -classpath …/rscd.jar; *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Quest compiler
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“liquidazer, post:1, topic:280282”]Hey was just wondering how to construct the compiler that is located in…

RSCD_v25/Quests/(Compile_scripts.bat)

Not sure what this compiles into, Dont have a clue because the batch file had nothing in it.[/quote]

There’s no separate compiler for quests. If you save the quest.java file in the src/org/etc/quests folder, it should compile when you compile the whole server.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest compiler
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

That quest system is rather basic.

Just compile the .java files, but make sure you reference the rscd.jar & everything needed to run rscd.jar.

Read full topic
